name: 2048 (itch) (Vircon32)
description:
The original 2048 was a web and mobile game. In this puzzle, moving the board lets you combine number tiles to make them grow. How far can you  get?

This is a port of 2048 for Vircon32 console, featuring music and improved graphics but keeping the same gameplay.

This was the first complete game for Vircon32 game console (you can learn about it at its website). This game is open source, you can find the sources at the website or browse the code directly on GitHub.
